name: Loan Officer
description: A loan officer is a representative of a bank, credit union, or other financial institution who assists borrowers in the application process

name: Management
description: The person who is in overall charge of the running of an organization or business

name: Relation Officer
description: Relation officer handle the concerns of the people who buy their company's products or services. They work to rectify issues experienced by individual customers as well as aim to improve the organization's overall customer satisfaction ratings.

name: Audit
description: Financial Auditor to handle payment processed

name: Internal Control
description: Internal controls are the mechanisms, rules, and procedures implemented by a company to ensure the integrity of financial and accounting information, promote accountability, and prevent fraud

name: Finance
description: Finance handle payout and management of large amounts of money
